title: Kusuma ma’am from CSE department commits su*ci*de
content:
Title. She was one of the best professors I knew and I’ve spoken to her multiple times about life in general post college hours. 
Really going to miss her.

comments.body: Clarification: Her passing is confirmed from a verified source. Su***** not 100 percent.

https://preview.redd.it/e7h3wzpn24ke1.jpeg?width=960&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=1e54ca380d47d5da98ca4ce26a2923c267a831af

Rest in peace ma’am, you were and will always be loved. 💐🕊️

What is suicide not 100%?
You only claim stuff like this when it's official.

Once again, locking the comments cause we aren't 100% sure of the cause. Any future posts will be directly deleted. 

You cannot put an "announcement" flair and put su*icide in the title/body and then claim that it is "not 100%". Please fact check before making such statements.
